statements: SELECT * FROM donation_records WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donation_records WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donation_date, donation_amount FROM donation_records ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_purpose FROM donation_records WHERE donation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM donation_records WHERE donation_purpose IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM donation_records ORDER BY donation_date DESC, donation_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT donor_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM donation_records GROUP BY donor_name ORDER BY total_donation DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT donor_name, donation_purpose FROM donation_records WHERE donation_amount > 1000 AND donation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donation_date, AVG(donation_amount) AS avg_donation FROM donation_records GROUP BY donation_date HAVING AVG(donation_amount) > 500 ORDER BY donation_date;
SELECT * FROM donation_records WHERE donor_name LIKE '%John%' AND donation_purpose IS NOT NULL ORDER BY donation_amount DESC, donation_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM donations
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC
SELECT donation_date, donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT donation_id, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' LIMIT 10
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations
SELECT * FROM donation_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000
SELECT donation_id, donor_name FROM donations WHERE donation_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT category_name, COUNT(category_id) AS total_donations FROM donation_categories GROUP BY category_name HAVING total_donations > 5
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;

SELECT donors.donor_name, donations.donation_amount, transactions.transaction_date FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donation_id JOIN transactions ON donations.donation_id = transactions.donation_id;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, address FROM donors WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC, donation_date
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000
SELECT donor_name, contact_email, address FROM donors WHERE address IS NOT NULL
SELECT d.donor_name, t.transaction_date, dn.donation_amount FROM donors d JOIN transactions t ON d.donor_id = t.donor_id JOIN donations dn ON t.donation_id = dn.donation_id
SELECT donor_name, COUNT(*) AS donation_count FROM donations GROUP BY donor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations
SELECT * FROM donors
SELECT donor_name, email, phone_number FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE 'John%' AND donation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY donation_date;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, email, phone_number FROM donors WHERE donor_id IN (SELECT donor_id FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 500);
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_purpose = 'Education' ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND donation_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, donor_phone FROM donors WHERE donor_address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT campaign_name, goal_amount FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount >= 1000 AND donation_purpose = 'Education';
SELECT report_name, generated_date, pdf_link FROM reports WHERE generated_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
